2124.subject: MIT
2124.descrlong: Focuses on marketing of information technology services and products with a global perspective. Examines the global marketing imperative, global marketing environment, the differences and similarities in societies and cultures with regard to the legal and ethical implications of marketing strategies, developing global readiness, and global marketing.
